section.title: Assign agent as responsible to services
section.para: As in "My Services" or "My Queues" agents will be assigned to services within the related user preferences.
The settings for the service responsibilities can be set on the preferences widget "Service Responsible". They can be saved with the button "Update".

section.title: Configuration of notifications for service responsible
section.para: Within the administration menu "Notification (Event)" the notification option for the service responsible can be set. For this to work a new entry is available below "Recipients".

section.title: Assign agent as responsible to services
section.para: As in "My Services" or "My Queues" agents will be assigned to services within the related user preferences.
The settings for the service responsibilities (as in the screen-shot) can be set on the preferences widget "Service Responsible". They can be saved with the button "Update".

section.title: Notification options for service responsible
section.para: Within the administration menu "Notification (Event)" the notification option for the service responsible can be set. For this to work a new entry is available below "Recipients".

As viewable in the screen-shot, the service responsibilities of all assigned agents can be chosen with the option "All agents responsible for the service" the Sent to: field, to notify the responsible agents.
